narrative.narrative: Aloha Air Cargo is the part of Aloha Airlines that didn't cease operation in 2008, and also has its base at Honolulu. They flew cargo between Honolulu and 4 other Hawaiian airports. They began a route to Los Angeles in October 2014 5x weekly with a 767-300F that was ordered new. They also have three 737-200Cs from the former passenger part of thr airline on active duty and three in storage, two 737-300F's which used to be with Lufthansa and three Saab 340's.
